author: Retro Game Corps
description:
Anbernic fixed its major software bug, so let's review it in its current state.

Anbernic direct: https://tinyurl.com/RGDS-RGC
AliExpress: https://s.click.aliexpress.com/e/_c4SzUyVR

Impressions video: https://youtu.be/9bRTbZFP1c8
TechCravers software video: https://youtu.be/yxL3jY_i_aA
GammaOS preview: https://youtu.be/o6gxsTiQgTI
GammaOS Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/GammaOS
Pixel Guide app: https://github.com/rexmont/Pixel-Guide-Android
DraStic fork: https://github.com/R-YaTian/DraStic_rev_i18n/releases
Stylus video: https://youtu.be/BoYp30Meki0
My favorite stylus: https://www.etsy.com/listing/4389860171/small-gaming-stylus-solid-aluminum-retro
use code "RETROSTYLUS" for 30% off

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this review ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.retrogamecorps.com
Stickers and magnets: https://www.ebay.com/str/retrogamecorpschar
title: Anbernic RG DS Review: Better, but Flawed
